Articles.Content: I really want old editions like 0.18 and 0.7.3 but I can't find them anywhere can anyone tell me I want to record a video with all versions but I can't find anything before 0.25. BTW I will give a shoutout on my YT channel it isn't popular but it you can still say "Hi mom I'm on TV!"
You can get anything before version 0.13.3 here:

...And any versions newer than 13.3 but older than what you can get through Steam (properties -> betas -> previous stable release) are not allowed to be distributed. Trying to ask around for them will get your thread locked by a moderator.

So if, through some channel or other, you do manage to obtain an old version... please do not give your source a shoutout on youtube. They won't appreciate it
